actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to suspend temporarily the duties on certain fresh, chilled, or frozen meats.

summary.text: Suspends temporarily the duties under the Tariff Schedules of the United States on fresh, chilled, or frozen meats, including cattle, goats, sheep, lambs, and swine. (Amends 19 U.S.C.1202)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to suspend temporarily the duties on certain fresh, chilled, or frozen meats.
